title: Angelina Jolie's kids steal the show at 'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil' premiere
text:
The gang's all here.

Angelina Jolie and her brood stole the show at Monday's world premiere of "Maleficent: Mistress of Evil" at El Capitan Theatre in Los Angeles.

The actress, who reprises her role as the horned fairy Maleficent, stunned in a black one-shouldered Atelier Versace gown that featured a show-stopping scorpion brooch.

But Jolie's best accessory of the night was her kids. She was accompanied by five of her six children: Pax, 15, Zahara, 14, Shiloh, 13, and 11-year-old twins Vivienne and Knox.

The group was all smiles as they took the red carpet by storm. In one picture, Pax wrapped his arm around Shiloh, who adorably embraced Vivienne.

'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil': Angelina Jolie is fierce in the teaser trailer

Angelina Jolie, third right, and her children, from left, Pax Jolie-Pitt, Shiloh Jolie-Pitt, Vivienne Jolie-Pitt, Zahara Jolie-Pitt and Knox Jolie-Pitt arrive at the world premiere of More

The famous family was just one member short.

Maddox, 18, who often attends premieres with his mother and siblings, missed the "Maleficent" screening because he's off to college at Yonsei University in South Korea.

"Maleficent: Mistress of Evil" (in theaters Oct. 18) is the follow-up to Jolie's biggest box office hit, 2014's "Maleficent."

More: Angelina Jolie explaining her emotional farewell to college-bound Maddox will make you cry

See our full coverage of entertainment news

This article originally appeared on USA TODAY: Angelina Jolie's kids steal the show at 'Maleficent 2' premiere in LA
description: Angelina Jolie, who reprises her role in 'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil,' stunned in a black gown. But her best accessory of the night was her kids.
